description:
Ukrainian for Everyone (the course for beginners) is a perfect resource for those who want to make a good start in learning Ukrainian but have only 15 minutes a day. This course is for complete beginners who know no more than the alphabet. 

The course consists of 10 video lectures (12-14 minutes each) and covers the basic grammar, pronunciation peculiarities and  the most important topics such as:

- greetings,

- professions,

- countries and nationalities, 

- talking about your family 

- ordering food, 

- orientation in the city,

- telling about yourself,

- asking basic questions and much more.

Each video lecture goes with some additional learning resources like a short sum up of the lecture, the list of extra relevant words and phrases, exercises, tests, etc.

The usage of the modern learning methods and techniques ensures that everything is memorised effortlessly. 

You will need 10 days to complete the course as it is recommended to do one lecture a day. 

At the end of the course you will be able to have a basic conversation with a native speaker, will know the most important words and phrases and will set up the perfect fundamentals for further learning.
title: Ukrainian For Everyone, a Course for Beginners
